Application.Utils

Class ImageProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Utils.ImageProcessor

  • @Component
public class ImageProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class used to create the photo collage of a given Vision.
    Information about the size are pulled from the application's property file.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

    • Method Detail

      • checkPictureListStr

        public boolean checkPictureListStr(int layout,
                                   java.lang.String picturesListStr)
        Utility functions that checks that enough picture's URLs are present depending on the layout.
        Parameters:
        layout - Integer representing the layout (1 and 2 are vertical and horizontal respectively, 3 is squared).
        picturesListStr - String with the URLs of the pictures, the slot they belong in, the start coordinates and the magnifying factor.
        Data is ";" separated at the higher level. Other information is separated by ":".
        Returns:
        boolean depending whether or not there are enough picture's URLs depending on the layout.

      • createPhotoCollage

        public byte[] createPhotoCollage(int layout,
                                 java.lang.String picturesListStr)
                          throws PictureCreationException,
                                 UnsplashConnectionException
        Creates the photo collage for a new Vision.
        Parameters:
        layout - Integer representing the layout (1 and 2 are vertical and horizontal respectively, 3 is squared).
        picturesListStr - String with the URLs of the pictures, the slot they belong in, the start coordinates and the magnifying factor.
        Data is ";" separated at the higher level. Other information is separated by ":".
        Returns:
        byte[] with the final photo collage to be saved in the database.
        Throws:
        PictureCreationException - PictureCreationException, exception in creating photo collage for the new Vision.
        UnsplashConnectionException - UnsplashConnectionException, exception in connecting to Unsplash's APIs.

      • scaleImage

        private java.awt.image.BufferedImage scaleImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage before,
                                                float scale)
        Private utility function to scale the original image from Unsplash to fit at least either the height or the width of the slot in the photo collage.
        Parameters:
        before - original BufferedImage.
        scale - float representing the scaling factor for the image.
        Returns:
        BufferedImage with the rescaled image.
